pr_title: Remove local vs remote host selected metric

timeline.message: Merge branch 'remove-local-host-metrics' of github.com:palantir/atlasdb into remove-local-host-metrics

timeline.bodyText: I'm wondering if instead you could do @jeremyk-91 's filtering? So filter when this is 1, but publish when it's not?
timeline.author: jkozlowski

replies.bodyText: I'm removing it more because I don't think I have ever used it after the initial rollout. So even if we filter it, would it be used in debugging?
replies.author: Jolyon-S

replies.bodyText: I've seen it go down and slowly recover before. But I think you might be right, there might not be any in keeping the complexity here
replies.author: jkozlowski
